com.github.blackrush.acara

Interface Subscribable

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    EventBus

    public interface Subscribable
    Subscribable is the super-interface taking care about subscriptions of listeners.
    See Also:
    Publishable, EventBus

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Subscription subscribe(Object listener)
      Subscribe a listener.
      Subscription subscribeMany(Collection<?> listeners)
      Subscribe multiple listeners.

    • Method Detail

      • subscribe

        Subscription subscribe(Object listener)
        Subscribe a listener.
        Parameters:
        listener - a non-null listener
        Returns:
        this very same instance

      • subscribeMany

        Subscription subscribeMany(Collection<?> listeners)
        Subscribe multiple listeners.
        Parameters:
        listeners - a non-null collection of non-null listeners
        Returns:
        this very same instance
